title: Image classification in Galaxy with fruit 360 dataset
questions: How to solve an image classification problem using convolutional neural network (CNN)?
objectives: Learn how to create a CNN using Galaxy's deep learning tools
Solve an image classification problem on fruit 360 dataset using CNN in Galaxy

workflows.name: fruit_360
workflows.title: fruit_360

history.message: Fixed an error in WF. Must cut test label data to get labels only
Adde title and tag to WF
Wrote parts of fruit image classification tutorial.
Added the tutorial directory. Revising copied files now.
